intro: Rubroshorea acuta, commonly known as the sharp-leafed flame tree, is a striking tropical plant characterized by its vibrant red flowers and lance-shaped leaves. The bark is smooth and reddish-brown, adding to its visual appeal in both cultivated and natural settings.
